name: Animals Crossing (Slick Games)
description:
Oh no! The forest is on fire and the animals are trapped! You need to create a bridge to connect the banks and rescue as many of them as possible.

Please note: the downloaded versions work far better than the HTML one.

Controls:

Simply drag the blocks with your mouse or touchscreen.
F to toggle fullscreen.

Known Bugs:

  • The HTML version has a graphical pixel glitch when dragging.
  • The HTML version audio isn't quite in sync with the gameplay
